status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Spin down cells (~106) for 5 mins at 1800g to get clear pellet and try to remove all the traces of sea salt
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin down cells (~106) for 5 mins at 1800g to get clear pellet and try to remove all the traces of sea salt

components.data: Resuspend cells in 0.5 ml (per 108 cells) lysis buffer (10mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 5mM EDTA, 200mM NaCl, 0.2% w/v SDS), add 5µl RNase A (20 mg/ml) (Fermentas) and mix by inverting the tube several times
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend cells in 0.5 ml (per 108 cells) lysis buffer (10mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 5mM EDTA, 200mM NaCl, 0.2% w/v SDS), add 5µl RNase A (20 mg/ml) (Fermentas) and mix by inverting the tube several times

components.data: Incubate for 10 min at 60°C and add 2.5µl Proteinase K (10 mg/ml) (Fermentas). Incubate 1 hour at 60°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate for 10 min at 60°C and add 2.5µl Proteinase K (10 mg/ml) (Fermentas). Incubate 1 hour at 60°C.

components.data: Add 250 µl ice cold 5 M NaCl, and incubate on ice for 10 mins (protein precipitation step—salting out of protein).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 250 µl ice cold 5 M NaCl, and incubate on ice for 10 mins (protein precipitation step—salting out of protein).

components.data: Spin down at 16000-20000 RPM for 15 min and transfer supernatant to new tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin down at 16000-20000 RPM for 15 min and transfer supernatant to new tube

components.data: Add an equal volume (about 700-750 µl) of isopropanol and mix by inversion (genomic DNA precipitation). Pending on amount of gDNA, incubate 15 mins at room temperature (RT) or 1 hour at -20°C to improve the recovery
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add an equal volume (about 700-750 µl) of isopropanol and mix by inversion (genomic DNA precipitation). Pending on amount of gDNA, incubate 15 mins at room temperature (RT) or 1 hour at -20°C to improve the recovery

components.data: Spin down 10 min at RT to pellet gDNA precipitate
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin down 10 min at RT to pellet gDNA precipitate

components.data: Wash pellet 2X times with 500 µl 70% (v/v) ethanol by centrifuge at 16000-20000 RPM for 15 min
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash pellet 2X times with 500 µl 70% (v/v) ethanol by centrifuge at 16000-20000 RPM for 15 min

components.data: Remove the supernatant completely by aspiration and air dry gDNA pellet for 10-25 min at room temperature
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the supernatant completely by aspiration and air dry gDNA pellet for 10-25 min at room temperature

components.data: Resuspend gDNA in 10mM Tris-HCl (pH 8.0) leave overnight at RT for gDNA to resolve completely
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend gDNA in 10mM Tris-HCl (pH 8.0) leave overnight at RT for gDNA to resolve completely
